Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-54349 affecting package iperf3 for versions less than 3.17.1-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-54349 affecting package iperf3 for versions less than 3.17.1-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package iperf3 is earlier than 3.17.1-3, affected by CVE-2025-54349
